Significance:
First artificial satellite
First signals from space
First US satellite, detection of Van Allen radiation belts

First rocket engine restart in Earth orbit
First lunar spacecraft
First detection of solar wind
First human-made object in heliocentric orbit
First satellite in a polar orbit
First spy satellite to carry a camera (failed to achieve orbit)
First photograph of Earth from orbit
First impact into another celestial body (Moon)
First photos of far side of the Moon
First successful US spy satellite (returned intelligence data)
First satellite recovered intact from orbit

First successful recovery of film from an orbiting satellite
First aerial recovery of an object returning from Earth orbit
First animals and plants returned alive from space

First launch from Earth orbit of upper stage into a heliocentric orbit
First mid-course corrections
First spin-stabilisation

First human spaceflight (Yuri Gagarin)
First orbital flight of a manned vehicle
First artificial satellite constructed by a non-superpower
First planetary flyby by a US mission (Venus)

First woman in space (Valentina Tereshkova)
First civilian in space

First soft landing on another celestial body (Moon)
First photos from another celestial body
First artificial satellite to orbit another celestial body: the Moon

First direct-ascent rendezvous on first orbit
Record highest apogee, 1,374 kilometers (854 mi), for piloted Earth orbit

First 5.5 hr extra-vehicular activity
First demonstration of practical work capability
First docking of two remote-controlled spacecraft
First human-crewed spaceflight to, and orbit of, another celestial object: the Moon

First humans on the Moon
First space launch from another celestial body
First precisely targeted piloted landing on the Moon (Surveyor 3 site)
First robotic automatic sample return from another celestial body: the Moon
First remote-controlled mobile vehicle on another celestial body: the Moon

First soft landing on another planet (Venus)
First signals from another planet

First human-crewed orbital observatory (Orion 1)
23-day manned space record
First mobile vehicle lunar rover driven by humans on the Moon
First spacecraft to orbit another planet: Mars

First soft Mars landing
First signals from Mars surface
First human-made object sent on escape trajectory away from the Sun
First mission to enter the asteroid belt and leave inner solar system
First commercially operated domestic satellite in geostationary orbit
